name: IntimatePartnerViolenceScreeningAssessmentsQuestions
title: Intimate Partner Violence Screening Assessments Questions
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents screening assessment questions for Intimate Partner Violence as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: This set of values may be used to represent screening assessment questions in observations, questionnaires, and questionnaire responses for this SDOH domain (e.g., for the SDOHCC Observation Screening Response profile in the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for SDOH screening assessment questions as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes the questions not selected by the Gravity Project from SDOH screening assessments.)

concept.display: Within the last year, have you been humiliated or emotionally abused in other ways by your partner or ex-partner
Within the last year, have you been afraid of your partner or ex-partner
Within the last year, have you been raped or forced to have any kind of sexual activity by your partner or ex-partner
Within the last year, have you been kicked, hit, slapped, or otherwise physically hurt by your partner or ex-partner

contains.display: Within the last year, have you been humiliated or emotionally abused in other ways by your partner or ex-partner
Within the last year, have you been afraid of your partner or ex-partner
Within the last year, have you been raped or forced to have any kind of sexual activity by your partner or ex-partner
Within the last year, have you been kicked, hit, slapped, or otherwise physically hurt by your partner or ex-partner
